messages.subject: New Homeschool Website
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, My name is Johanne.  I live in a small town in Lewis County in Tennessee.  I have been homeschooling for a few years now.  I have a 7 year old and an
messages.messageBody:
Hi,
My name is Johanne. I live in a small town in Lewis County in
Tennessee. I
have been homeschooling for a few years now. I have a 7 year old and
an
almost 1 year old. I made a website for
the homeschoolers here and for all homeschoolers. It has a classified
section too, that all homeschoolers can use for free to sell your
homeschool
items or other items. I also have a calendar for field trips/chats to
be added too,
that anyone can use. I also have a lot of links to sites for
homeschoolers.
Have not had a lot of traffic yet so hope that you all will take a
look at
it and bookmark it. If you like it please tell other homeschool
friends about it too.
http://www.lewiscountyhomeschool.com Thanks.

Johanne
